Ok, I believe I need to jump-start this topic.

Obviously, I would like to specify max number of members for each 
team and when to reset; and max number of objects per team and when 
to reset (mainly to keep Druids from going overboard with planting 
trees).

The thing I am wondering about is how we could allow the creator of a 
scenario set default stats for new characters.  Would this be done on 
a per team basis or a per character basis?
